When it comes to illuminating an existing bathroom mirror, LED Wall Mounted Bath Vanity Lights are the best choice. The LED vanity lighting fixture will provide excellent illumination, as it offers a high per-watt lumen output. The fixture will operate on an input of 120V and is dimmable so that you can adjust its brightness. In comparison with traditional vanity light fixtures, it will allow easy installation and consume little energy peruse.

A high color rendering index (CRI) of 80 makes it suitable for installation above the bathroom mirror. Its bright and uniform illumination will enhance visibility and render the surrounding space's true colors. The lighting fixture offers three color temperatures so that you can change between a cool white, warm white, or daylight white appearance. Premium-quality LED chips to make it a reliable LED Bathroom Vanity & Wall Light. This lighting fixture comes with a rating of 50,000 operational hours and is compliant with industry-standard ETL certification; thus, it is suitable for bathroom spaces.

The Dimmable LED bath Bar is available in three variations:

  • The 25-Watt version measures 24 inches (L) x 5 inches (W) x 3 inches (H and provides an output of 1750 lumens.
  • The 30-Watt version measures 36 inches (L) x 5 inches (W) x 3 inches (H) and provides an output of 2100 lumens.
  • The 35-watt version measures 48 inches (L) x inches (W) x 3 inches (H) and provides an output of 2450 lumens.


The light features a simple and sophisticated design and has a white acrylic shade. Depending on your bathroom's design and color scheme, you can choose between brushed nickel and oil rubbed bronze (ORB) finishes. Furthermore, a robust steel body and break-resistant acrylic lens ensure that the fixture will last long and withstand any accidental fall during installation or removal.
